column3: 4 Add-1 heaped tbsp flour to a blender
1 Add-1/2 tsp baking powder to a blender
7 Melt-Melt a small knob of butter in a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat
8 Pour-Pour three little puddles straight from the blender into the frying pan
9 Cook-Cook for 1 min or until the tops start to bubble
10 Flip-Flip the pancakes with a fork or a fish slice spatula
13 Serve-Serve the pancakes with chopped strawberries
